transcript: Just weeks after donning a high-neck, long-sleeved lace gown for her wedding to Amazon founder Jeff Bezos, has made her first public appearance as a newlywed—quickly returning to her old fashion habits. The 55-year-old stepped out in Paris on Tuesday night for dinner with model wearing a skintight, fire-red dress by Versace that, for many, looked more clubwear than couture. Netizens, as usual, were ruthless in their commentary, with many wondering whether she could breathe as the corset-style bodice tightly pushed her cleavage up. “That dress is so tight her fake boobs are ,” one commenter mocked. Another sniped, “Was that her wedding present, bigger balloons? Lauren Sanchez got roasted by the internet for stepping out in skin-tight bodysuit that compressed her chest The $3,515 dress, currently listed on luxury resale site Vestiaire Collective, clung to her frame and hit just above the knees, putting her legs on full display alongside strappy black heels and a $50,000 Hermès Kelly bag. For many viewers, the contrast between her face and her knees was striking, serving as a reminder that while cosmetic procedures can smooth a face, they don't extend to the legs. “The knees show it all,” one user wrote. “There is nothing real about this woman except being a home wrecker and gold digger.” Ever since she attended Donald Trump's inauguration wearing a revealing white blazer that brought plenty of attention to her chest, Sanchez Bezos has been at the center of ongoing scrutiny. Her cleavage at the event was so prominent it became a meme in itself—circulating widely alongside photos of a visibly distracted Mark Zuckerberg, who appeared unable to look away. “She better watch or she will puncture one of her implants, stuffing it into these getups,” one user wrote. Her image took another hit earlier this year with the fallout from Blue Origin's all-female spaceflight, a mission she led alongside pop star Katy Perry and four other women. Though touted by the Bezos-owned aerospace company as a historic achievement—marking the first all-female flight beyond the Kármán line since 1963—the launch was quickly dismissed by many as a tone-deaf vanity project. Sanchez' marriage to Bezos is her third, with their relationship starting while both were engaged to their respective previous partners @purepeople ✨ Lauren Sanchez et Brooks Nader ont été aperçues ce soir à Paris, se rendant ensemble à un dîner dans la capitale, en marge de la Fashion Week Haute Couture. Complices et ultra stylées, les deux amies ont attiré tous les regards avec leurs looks glamour, entre élégance et vibes parisiennes. Une apparition remarquée sous les flashs dans les rues de la Ville Lumière. #LaurenSanchez #BrooksNader #ParisNights #HauteCouture #FashionWeek #BestImage #purepeople ♬ son original – Purepeople The dinner, part of Paris Haute Couture Week, was also attended by Brooks Nader who wore capri pants and a sheer black halter blouse. While both women turned heads in the French capital, it was Sanchez Bezos that captured the attention of netizens. “She looks very uncomfortable,” another netizen wrote. “Not sure how she even breathed in the dress.” Her appearance comes fresh off the heels of her opulent Venetian wedding to Bezos, which featured a restored amphitheater ceremony, a Dolce & Gabbana gown that allegedly took over 900 hours to make, and performances by Ellie Goulding and Usher. The high-profile guest list included Kim Kardashian, Kris Jenner, Ivanka Trump, and Bill Gates. Lauren Sanchez Bezos' marriage to Jeff Bezos is her third. Her first husband was former NFL tight end Tony Gonzalez, with whom she shares a son, Nikko, born in 2001. Her second marriage, far more high-profile, was to Patrick Whitesell, a powerful Hollywood agent and the executive chairman of Endeavor. They married in 2005 and had two children together. Sanchez and Bezos began their relationship while she was still married to Whitesell and he was still married to MacKenzie Scott. The affair, which was exposed via leaked text messages in 2019, ended both marriages and set off one of the most expensive divorces in history. Sanchez declared herself happy, and said that Bezos is not only a husband to her, but her best friend @taoualitamar #laurensanchez wife of #jeffbezos in #paris ♬ son original – AMAR TAOUALIT For Sanchez Bezos, the social media noise seems irrelevant. “I'm very happy,” she told the press after the wedding. “More than the dress, I'm happy that I'm getting married and I get to spend my life with my best friend, someone who sees me, someone who adores me, someone who I adore. I am the luckiest woman on the planet.” While many defended her and accused her detractors of being jealous of her success, even her fans believe her love life has been more strategic than passionate. “You don't bag three top-5% men in one lifetime without being a bit strategic, transactional, and calculated about your love life,” a user wrote. Among her fanbase, the 55-year-old is praised for maintaining an alluring image and refusing to conform to what's expected of her considering her age and status. “She is extremely fit, well-groomed, and stylish in a seductive way while most other women her age tend to ditch that kind of 'bombshell' sex appeal for a more classy 'wifey material' look,” a fan stated. “No class!” Netizens took to social media to criticize Sanchez Bezos for her dress

transcript: SPR_COMBO[pl]CNBC przypomina, że sprzedaż akcji Amazona przez Bezosa jest częścią planu ogłoszonego na początku tego roku, zgodnie z którym miliarder sprzeda do 25 mln akcji Amazona do maja 2026 r. Czytaj też: Platforma X bez prezesa. Współpracowniczka Elona Muska złożyła rezygnację Założyciel Amazona, mimo rezygnacji z funkcji prezesa firmy w 2021 r., nadal posiada ponad 900 mln akcji Amazon, wycenianych na blisko 200 mld dol. Ślub Jeffa Bezosa i Lauren Sanchez. Wenecja zarobiła miliony euro Wenecja częściowo opustoszała, a strategiczne punkty w rejonie najbardziej luksusowych hoteli, gdzie zatrzymała się amerykańska para i jej goście, przestały być strefami nadzwyczajnych środków bezpieczeństwa. Wokół nich przez kilka dni gromadziły się dziesiątki paparazzi i wysłanników mediów, którzy podążali na motorówkach za uczestnikami ceremonii — taki był obraz Wenecji w trakcie ślubu miliardera i założyciela Amazona Jeffa Bezosa z byłą amerykańską dziennikarką Lauren Sanchez. Czytaj także w BUSINESS INSIDER Czytaj też: Nvidia: pierwsza spółka z wartością rynkową 4 bilionów dolarów Bezos i Sanchez, których ślub odbył się w piątek, wyjechali z Wenecji w niedzielne popołudnie po całej serii przyjęć i hucznych obchodów w kilku punktach miasta. Ostatnia ceremonia odbyła się w Arsenale i według mediów było to "pidżama party" pod hasłem Dolce Notte (słodka noc). Gośćmi amerykańskiej pary byli między innymi córka prezydenta USA Donalda Trumpa— Ivanka Trump z mężem Jaredem Kushnerem, królowa Jordanii Rania, Bill Gates, Steven Spielberg, Leonardo DiCaprio z partnerką Vittorią Ceretti, Orlando Bloom, Kim Kardashian z rodziną, Oprah Winfrey, Donatella Versace. Obecności Bezosa i Sanchez w Wenecji towarzyszyły protesty przeciwników organizacji ich ślubu w mieście i wynajmowania jego części na takie uroczystości. Akcje te skrytykowały lokalne władze, argumentując, że to wielka szansa dla tego historycznego miasta. Według Ministerstwa Turystyki Włoch to wydarzenie o globalnym zasięgu oznacza wpływ gospodarczy dla Wenecji szacowany na ponad 950 mln euro.

transcript: SPR_COMBO[pt]Metade da alegria de uma boa compulsão vem de definir a cena, certo? Esteja você por uma narrativa emocional, drama emocionante ou uma fuga sobrenatural, o ambiente torna tudo melhor. Então, aqui estão a série obrigatória com alguns pequenos extras aconchegantes para fazer com que sua próxima compulsão pareça uma mini escapada, mesmo que seja apenas o seu sofá. Confie em nós: uma boa série merece mais do que comida fria e meias arranhadas. Aqui estão as melhores escolhas com complementos perfeitos para tornar sua próxima compulsão ainda melhor. transcript: The real cost of just existing in the UK 🇬🇧 — not thriving, not living your best life, just… existing. When I first moved here, I thought I'd cracked the code. Rent? Sorted. Groceries? Done. Uni and a part-time job? Balanced. But then life did what it does best — humbled me Because no one warns you about the invisible costs. The kind that sneak up on you on a random Tuesday. The  kind that don't show up on your budget spreadsheet but always seem to show up in real life. Like you step out for “just eggs and milk” and come back £30 poorer. Or your laundry card suddenly needs another £10 and you're down to your last pair of socks. Or your train to London is £40 one way because you booked 3 days late. It's not even about being reckless. It's just… life here is expensive in ways that are hard to plan for. Especially when you're new, learning the system, figuring things out, and trying to keep it all together on a student budget. And the truth is Living here is not just rent + groceries + WiFi It's also: — Bus passes, Uber when it rains (which is always) — Indian groceries and takeaways when you're too tired to cook — Bedding, toilet rolls, painkillers, scissors, socks, water filters — Spontaneous society events, someone's birthday, — Emotional support coffee ☕ That's why I'm saying this: An emergency fund isn't a rich people thing. It's a survival buffer. You don't need to save £1,000 overnight. Start with £5 a week. Or whatever you can. It's for that one week where everything goes wrong. And trust me — there will be a week like that. Save this post. It'll make sense later. Tag someone who still thinks £800/month T-Shirt: thenorthfaceuk Jacket: riverisland riverislandpr Bag: tommyhilfiger Glasses: versace #uklife #studentbudgeting #studentlife #coffee #laundry #emergencyfund #student #tommyhilfiger #internationalstudent #purse #riverisland #versace #studyabroad #studenttips #budgetingtips #yapper #northface

transcript: First impressions: 1. Groove is still in the heart. Dee-lite's Lady Miss Kir dressed as Cher from Clueless. 2A. Bad case of "these are the designers I'm wearing"--I GOT MUSTARD ON MY VERSACE! DID YOU HEAR ME? MY VERSACE! MUSTARD ON IT! 2B. Spotted wearing giant Chanel logo on chain in next episode promos 2C. Don't touch the "emotional support Birkin"--bitch bring a dog like everyone else. 3. Entire interview dedicated to letting us know she wasn't a gold digger, then presents photo showing younger self coyly seated atop rich old man's lap. OK toots. Just own it. That pic wasn't taken on his break from his janitor shift, it was taken on his private plane. SOMETHING made him attractive... 4. Seems hard working, I like that. 5. Has inserted finger into a chicken, always a handy bon mot to bring up at a baby shower. Props. Martina once again is dragged off to some party where she gamely pretends to support her wife in all her endeavors, including appreciating Kiki twerking in her face and examining the contents of a diaper. Guerdy is filmed crying to Russell about having water thrown at her as though she were the Wicked Witch. In fact, she does highly resemble Elphaba and this could be her ticket to Broadway and being Very Rich, Bitch like Nene's former glory days. Put a pin in that one. Russell expresses concern that Julia, a quote "very large, tall woman" was STANDING OVER his beloved while she is still recovering from breast cancer (no statute of limitations on that one I guess). Umm, has he ever seen Guerdy stand up? Aren't they all rather tall other than Marysol and maybe Lisa and Adriana? Speaking of Lisa--praise be to the editors for that magical juxtaposition of Jody and the Furby. I laughed so hard I startled my dog. Marysol has been suspiciously sober this season so far. I'm glad for her, but sad for myself. I wonder if it will last. Larsa stages a phone call with a [s]witness[/s] friend for backup regarding her story about Jody's suspiciously amped behavior at the "fashion" show they attended. Was this a no-phones-allowed event? She could have just recorded him and shown us all, but I guess maybe that's discouraged by the editors, IDK. Alexia --I cannot muster up even one giveadamn about her marriage to whatever his name was. If this was the best storyline she could come up with, her days as a HW are numbered.

transcript: SPR_COMBO[el]Η Λόρεν Σάντσεζ πραγματοποίησε μία εντυπωσιακή εμφάνιση με κόκκινο, σέξι φόρεμα στο Παρίσι, χωρίς τον σύζυγό της Τζεφ Μπέζος. Ήταν η πρώτη δημόσια εμφάνιση της Λόρεν Σάντσεζ μετά τον πολυσυζητημένο γάμο της με τον δισεκατομμυριούχο ιδρυτή της Amazon, Τζεφ Μπέζος, που έγινε τον περασμένο μήνα στην Ιταλία με κόστος 50 εκατομμυρίων δολαρίων. Το τριήμερο πάρτι γάμου φιλοξένησε 200 εκλεκτούς καλεσμένους και χαρακτηρίστηκε από πολλούς ως «Ο Γάμος του Αιώνα». Το βράδυ της Τρίτης, η Λ.Σάντσεζ εμφανίστηκε χωρίς τον Μπέζος στο Παρίσι, όπου δείπνησε στο κομψό εστιατόριο Laperouse με τον βραβευμένο με Όσκαρ ηθοποιό Λεονάρντο Ντι Κάπριο, τον επίσης βραβευμένο Σον Πεν, το μοντέλο Μπρουκς Νέιντερ και άλλες διασημότητες. Η 55χρονη κυρία Μπέζος προκάλεσε αναστάτωση κατά την άφιξή της, φορώντας ένα εντυπωσιακό κόκκινο φόρεμα από λάτεξ του οίκου Versace, αξίας πάνω από 3.500 δολάρια, το οποίο τόνιζε το πλούσιο μπούστο της. Το λουκ ολοκληρώθηκε με μαύρη τσάντα Hermès Kelly από δέρμα κροκόδειλου. Σύμφωνα με δημοσιεύματα, ο Ντι Κάπριο ντυμένος στα μαύρα, με καπέλο, αποχώρησε από το εστιατόριο πριν τη Σάντσεζ και τη Νέιντερ, συνοδευόμενος μόνο από έναν σωματοφύλακα. Ο 64χρονος Σον Πεν έφτασε συνοδευόμενος από την εντυπωσιακή 30χρονη σύντροφό του, Βαλέρια Νίκοβ. Η απουσία του Τ.Μπέζος πιθανότατα οφείλεται σε επαγγελματικές υποχρεώσεις, καθώς αναμένεται να παρευρεθεί στο ετήσιο συνέδριο ηγετών της Allen & Co. στο Σαν Βάλεϊ του Αϊντάχο αυτή την εβδομάδα.

transcript: SPR_COMBO[lt]Liepos 10-oji, ketvirtadienis, 28 savaitė. Dangaus kūnai: saulė teka 4.54 val. , leidžiasi 21.54 val. Dienos ilgumas 17.00 val. Mėnulis (pilnatis) leidžiasi 3.30 val. , teka 22.33 val. Vardadieniai: Amalija, Eirimė, Gilvainis, Prudencija, Rufina, Sigutė Datos: Septyni broliai miegantys (jei šią dieną lyja, lietus nesiliaus septynias dienas arba septynias savaites) Liepos 10-oji Lietuvos istorijoje: 1887 — Liudvikas Zamenhofas išleido savo sukurtos tarptautinės esperanto kalbos vadovėlį. 1911 — gimė dirigentas, kompozitorius Vytautas Marijošius. Mirė 1996 m. 1931 — gimė Kauno dramos teatro aktorius Algimantas Masiulis. 1942 — gimė poetė Julija Jekentaitė. 2007 — eidama 77-uosius metus, mirė muzikologė, pedagogė Ona Narbutienė. Penkiolikos knygų autorė ir sudarytoja, daugybės publikacijų autorė, pedagogė, švietėja, įsimintinų koncertų, festivalių organizatorė ir siela, O.Narbutienė visą savo gyvenimą nuoširdžiai tarnavo Lietuvos kultūrai. 2014 — mirė išeivijos verslininkas, visuomenės veikėjas JAV lietuvis Juozas Kazickas, organizavęs JAV finansinių fondų vadovų vizitus į Baltijos šalis, Lietuvos vadovų ir politikų susitikimus su Vakarų lyderiais, konsultavęs Lietuvos vadovus. 2023 — NATO viršūnių susitikimo Vilniuje išvakarėse Aljansas patvirtino naujus gynybos planus, detaliau apibrėžiančius, kaip būtų ginamos Baltijos šalys Rusijos užpuolimo atveju. Liepos 10-oji pasaulio istorijoje: 1509 — gimė prancūzų-šveicarų kilmės religijos reformatorius, protestantas John Calvin (Džonas Kalvinas). 1645 — Oliver Cromwell (Oliverio Kromvelio) armija sumušė anglų rojalistus. 1871 — gimė prancūzų rašytojas Marcel Proust (Marselis Prustas), žinomas kaip romano „Prarasto laiko beieškant. Svano pusėje“, autorius. Mirė 1922 m. 1943 — II pasaulinio karo metais sąjungininkų daliniai išsilaipino Sicilijoje (Italija). 1952 — buvo priimta Eritrėjos valstybės konstitucija, kurią paruošė Jungtinės Tautos. 1953 — nuo pareigų nušalintas SSRS vidaus reikalų ministras Lavrentij Berija (Lavrentijus Berija). 1962 — šią dieną įvyko pirmasis ryšių palydovo Telstar (Telstaras) paleidimas per Atlanto vandenyną, pradėjęs elektroninio ryšio amžių. 1973 — po tris šimtmečius trukusio britų administravimo, Bahamų salos pasiskelbė nepriklausomomis. 1989 — sprogus raketai Afganistano sostinėje Kabule, žuvo 20 žmonių. 1990 — Michail Gorbačiov (Michailas Gorbačiovas) perrinktas SSKP lyderiu. 1991 — prisiekė pirmasis Rusijos prezidentas Boris Jelcin (Borisas Jelcinas). 1992 — Hanna Suchocka (Hana Suchocka) tapo pirmąja moterimi Lenkijos istorijoje, tapusia ministre pirmininke. 1992 — buvęs Panamos diktatorius Manuel Noriega (Manuelis Norjega) uż narkotikų kontrabandą nuteistas kalėti 40 metų. 1997 — Majamyje (JAV) prie savo namų nušautas pasaulinio garso madų kūrėjas Gianni Versace (Džianis Versačė). 1999 — motociklo avarijoje žuvo 69-erių metų JAV astronautas Charles Conrad (Žarlzas Konradas) — trečiasis Mėnulyje vaikščiojęs žmogus. 2009 — JAV prezidentas Barack Obama (Barakas Obama) atvyko į Vatikaną, kur jis pirmą kartą susitiko su popiežiumi Benediktu XVI. 2011 — būdamas 87 metų amžiaus Ženevoje mirė iškilus Prancūzijos choreografas ir šokėjas Roland Petit (Rolanas Peti), padėjęs įkurti Eliziejaus laukų baleto teatrą (Les Ballets des Champs-Elysees) ir išugdęs kelias kitas šokio trupes. 2013 — didžiulis gaisras Paryžiuje nepataisomai suniokojo garsius 17-ojo amžiaus Lambert (Lambero) rūmus (Hotel Lambert), kuriuose Kataro karališkoji šeima vykdė prieštaringai vertinamą renovaciją. 2013 — būdamas 92 metų mirė Prancūzijos akordeono karaliumi laikytas muzikantas Andre Verchuren (Andrė Veršiuranas). Liepos 10-oji šou pasaulyje: 1954 — gimė grupės „Pet Shop Boys“ narys Neil Tennant (Neilas Tenantas). 1968 — Eric Clapton (Erikas Kleptonas) paskelbė apie grupės „Cream“ iširimą po atsisveikinimo turo. 1975 — dainininkė Cher (Šer) pareiškė norą skirtis su Greg Allman (Gregu Almanu), su kuriuo susituokė prieš 10 dienų. 1986 — Jerry Garcia (Džerį Garsią) ištiko diabetinė koma. Po poros savaičių jis buvo paleistas iš ligoninės. 2000 — David Orgell (Deivido Orgelio) juvelyrinių dirbinių parduotuvė Beverli Hilse pateikė 1.45 milijono dolerių ieškinį Michael Jackson (Maiklui Džeksonui). Ieškinys buvo susijęs su deimantais inkrustuotu laikrodžiu, kuris buvo grąžintas į parduotuvę apgadintas....

transcript: Numerator's research on the first two days of the event found that 30 percent of shoppers are clicking on apparel or footwear, tying with household essentials. Amazon's mini Christmas in July has consumers clicking on fashion — and there are more apparel brands in the promotional mix, including vintage designer style from ReBag as well as looks from Michael Kors, Naadam and more. Prime Day, which extended to four days this year and ends on Friday, has become a fixture on the retail calendar, prompting competing deals from other retailers. Altogether, retailers are expected to see $23.8 billion in sales, or the equivalent of two Black Fridays, according to Adobe. At Amazon, the event has had a strong fashion start. Numerator is tracking the e-commerce giant's Prime Day take, studying the activity of shoppers at 22,411 households and surveying 2,248 buyers during the sale's first two days. Thirty percent of buyers snatched up Prime Day apparel and footwear — tying for the top spot with cleaning products and other household essentials, according to the data and tech company. But in keeping with the general sense of caution in the market, consumers are being very calculated as they spend. Fifty-one percent of shoppers bought items that they'd been waiting to buy on sale and 37 percent of shoppers bought the same items they typically buy on Amazon. Numerator pegged the average order size on Prime Day at $57.12 and said 51 percent of households have made two or more orders, upping the average household spend to $126.26. Two-thirds of the Prime Day items have sold for under $20 while only 3 percent are over $100. Amazon has been steadily adding to its fashion mix and a company spokesperson pointed to the slate of fashions making their Prime Day debut. For the first time, the luxury resale player Rebag is offering price promotions on looks from Alexander McQueen, Chloé, Delvaux, Givenchy, Jacquemus, Valentino Garavani, Versace and Tom Ford on Amazon. And a host of brands have joined the rush this year and included select items in the event, such as Hervé Léger, Kate Barton, Calzedonia, Vans, Michael Kors and Naadam.

reasoning: While the content is primarily about Amazon Prime Day shopping, it specifically mentions Versace in the context of luxury fashion brands participating in the event, with Rebag offering price promotions on Versace items. The mention is contextually meaningful and relates to the brand's luxury fashion positioning.

transcript: SPR_COMBO[zh]🌟探索全球大理石的瑰宝:一份精选的国外大理石品种与产地指南，助你成为家装达人! 伊朗🇮🇷:莎安娜、白洞、云多拉灰、保加亚灰、红洞石、阿曼玫瑰、桔子玉、白玉、古青玉。 土耳其🇹🇷:范特西、闪电米黄、白玉兰、寒江雪、世纪米黄、奥特曼、索菲特金、古堡灰、香雪梅。 意大利🇮🇹:鱼肚白、大花白、卡拉拉白、宝格丽、黑金花、蓝金砂、Prada绿、紫山水、意大利木纹。 巴西🇧🇷:景泰蓝、格兰云天、亚马逊绿、雪山银狐、潘多拉、在水一方、静雅棕、Versace黑、鱼肚灰。 中国🇨🇳:松香玉、黑白根、罗曼蒂克灰、贵州木纹、冷翡翠、熊猫白、古木纹、东方白、山水画。 #大理石设计 #大理石 #材质 #鱼肚白岩板 #装饰材料 #奢石定制 #最美石材 #大理石源头 #天然材料美学 #中部石港

Mirė 1922 m. 1943 — II pasaulinio karo metais sąjungininkų daliniai išsilaipino Sicilijoje (Italija). 1952 — buvo priimta Eritrėjos valstybės konstitucija, kurią paruošė Jungtinės Tautos. 1953 — nuo pareigų nušalintas SSRS vidaus reikalų ministras Lavrentij Berija (Lavrentijus Berija). 1962 — šią dieną įvyko pirmasis ryšių palydovo Telstar (Telstaras) paleidimas per Atlanto vandenyną, pradėjęs elektroninio ryšio amžių. 1973 — po tris šimtmečius trukusio britų administravimo, Bahamų salos pasiskelbė nepriklausomomis. 1989 — sprogus raketai Afganistano sostinėje Kabule, žuvo 20 žmonių. 1990 — Michail Gorbačiov (Michailas Gorbačiovas) perrinktas SSKP lyderiu. 1991 — prisiekė pirmasis Rusijos prezidentas Boris Jelcin (Borisas Jelcinas). 1992 — Hanna Suchocka (Hana Suchocka) tapo pirmąja moterimi Lenkijos istorijoje, tapusia ministre pirmininke. 1992 — buvęs Panamos diktatorius Manuel Noriega (Manuelis Norjega) už narkotikų kontrabandą nuteistas kalėti 40 metų. 1997 — Majamyje (JAV) prie savo namų nušautas pasaulinio garso madų kūrėjas Gianni Versace (Džianis Versačė). 1999 — motociklo avarijoje žuvo 69-erių metų JAV astronautas Charles Conrad (Žarlzas Konradas) — trečiasis Mėnulyje vaikščiojęs žmogus. 2009 — JAV prezidentas Barack Obama (Barakas Obama) atvyko į Vatikaną, kur jis pirmą kartą susitiko su popiežiumi Benediktu XVI. 2011 — būdamas 87 metų amžiaus Ženevoje mirė iškilus Prancūzijos choreografas ir šokėjas Roland Petit (Rolanas Peti), padėjęs įkurti Eliziejaus laukų baleto teatrą (Les Ballets des Champs-Elysees) ir išugdęs kelias kitas šokio trupes. 2013 — didžiulis gaisras Paryžiuje nepataisomai suniokojo garsius 17-ojo amžiaus Lambert (Lambero) rūmus (Hotel Lambert), kuriuose Kataro karališkoji šeima vykdė prieštaringai vertinamą renovaciją. 2013 — būdamas 92 metų mirė Prancūzijos akordeono karaliumi laikytas muzikantas Andre Verchuren (Andrė Veršiuranas). Liepos 10-oji šou pasaulyje: 1954 — gimė grupės „Pet Shop Boys“ narys Neil Tennant (Neilas Tenantas). 1968 — Eric Clapton (Erikas Kleptonas) paskelbė apie grupės „Cream“ iširimą po atsisveikinimo turo. 1975 — dainininkė Cher (Šer) pareiškė norą skirtis su Greg Allman (Gregu Almanu), su kuriuo susituokė prieš 10 dienų. 1986 — Jerry Garcia (Džerį Garsią) ištiko diabetinė koma. Po poros savaičių jis buvo paleistas iš ligoninės. 2000 — David Orgell (Deivido Orgelio) juvelyrinių dirbinių parduotuvė Beverli Hilse pateikė 1.45 milijono dolerių ieškinį Michael Jackson (Maiklui Džeksonui). Ieškinys buvo susijęs su deimantais inkrustuotu laikrodžiu, kuris buvo grąžintas į parduotuvę apgadintas. 2006 — būdama 88-erių metų amžiaus savo namuose Kalifornijoje po ilgos ligos mirė pripažinimą pelniusi aktorė June Allyson (Džun Elison)....

transcript: Newlywed Lauren Sánchez-Bezos has made her first public appearance since her lavish Venetian wedding to Amazon founder Jeff Bezos, and she did so in unforgettable style. Stepping out in Paris for dinner with model Brooks Nader and her sister, Sarah Jane Nader, Sánchez stunned in a striking red latex dress by Versace. The eye-catching gown, retailing for around £2,700 ($3,515), featured a corset bodice that accentuated her curves, a ruched skirt, and a hemline just above the knee. Paired with strappy black heels and her signature confidence, the look turned heads across the City of Light. The dinner took place at the luxurious Laperouse restaurant after Sánchez was seen leaving the historic Hôtel de Crillon. Paris served as the perfect backdrop for her glamorous return, especially with the city buzzing for Haute Couture Week, running from 7 to 10 July. The evening marked Sánchez's first public sighting since her whirlwind wedding celebrations in Venice just last month. She and Bezos tied the knot in a multi-day extravaganza attended by 200 close friends and family. The guest list was star-studded, featuring Kim Kardashian, Ivanka Trump, Kris Jenner, and Bill Gates. Ellie Goulding performed at the reception, and Usher entertained guests at a playful pyjama-themed brunch the following day. For the ceremony, Sánchez wore a breathtaking Dolce & Gabbana lace gown inspired by screen legend Sophia Loren. The gown, featuring a high neck, long sleeves, and a sweeping veil, reportedly took over 900 hours to create in the atelier. She complemented it with a flared skirt and an intricately buttoned waist, embodying timeless elegance and cinematic glamour. During other events across the multi-day celebration, she showcased her bold sense of style: a gold corseted Schiaparelli couture dress at the welcome dinner and a rose-pink atelier Versace gown adorned with Swarovski crystals at their 'Dolce Notte' party. Each look highlighted her confident and sensual aesthetic, perfectly balancing drama and sophistication. Her return to Paris carries special meaning. The city hosted her unforgettable bachelorette festivities, where she celebrated with friends in a series of sheer and lacy looks that foreshadowed her bridal style. transcript: Anne Hathaway's style has historically (and understandably) leaned high-end: Bvlgari bags, Moncler coats, Versace suits. What else would the actor who gave us Andy Sachs wear? But back in December 2021, she proved that her luxurious style doesn't necessarily require luxury price tags. On a date night with husband Adam Shulman in New York City, Hathaway carried a $120 JW Pei Maze bag—and thanks to Amazon Prime Day, you can snag the exact same one for just $96. Courtesy of brand JW Pei Maze Crossbody $120 $96 (20% off) Amazon Hathaway's choice isn't too surprising when you consider JW Pei's dedicated celebrity following. Selena Gomez wore another of the brand's bags (also 20% off for Prime Day) to the 2024 Golden Globes alongside a couture gown. Gigi Hadid, Emily Ratajkowksi, and Hailey Bieber have also been spotted in the label, which is readily available on Amazon. In case you're not familiar, Prime Day is Amazon's biggest sale of the year, and it's double the usual length for 2025: The deals kicked off on July 8 and continue through Friday, July 11. Like many of the best markdowns—including another on one of Katie Holmes's go-to bags—you can only access JW Pei's sale prices with an Amazon Prime membership. (Sign up here.) While most colorways of that Chanel-esque Maze bag are now sold out, the rest of JW Pei's catalog is worth a look, considering it very rarely goes on sale. Shop more editor-approved favorites, including trendy east-west bags and a croc-embossed option that would feel right at home in an Anne Hathaway look, below. The deals wrap up on Friday evening, so act fast. transcript: She paired the metallic heels with a beaded Loewe dress. Vanessa Kirby stepped into shine and structure for Thursday's London premiere of “The Fantastic Four: First Steps,” wearing Aquazzura's Minute Sandal 105 in metallic silver — the latest entry in her sculptural maternity footwear streak.QUES The Italian-made stilettos featured mirrored leather uppers, two slim straps and a high, tapered heel. A back zip created a clean finish at the ankle, and the brand's signature gold plaque was visible on the sole. The 105mm silhouette added lift without disrupting the overall proportion. Related Stories Kirby paired the sandals with a beaded turquoise dress from Loewe's spring 2025 collection. The strapless midi-length look, styled by Andrew Mukamal, was constructed entirely of layered bead strands that created fringe-like movement across the body. The runway version featured a shorter hemline and metallic underlayer, but Kirby's custom iteration removed any lining to emphasize the vertical drape. Combined with the clean stiletto, the full look felt visually elongated. This marked Kirby's latest footwear-forward look on the “Fantastic Four: First Steps” press tour. Earlier this week in Paris, she wore metallic wraparound stilettos with a lilac Givenchy halter dress. In Mexico, she styled two different Manolo Blahnik silhouettes — including the black snakeskin Paloma heel — with cutout knits and a teal Schiaparelli gown. And at the Alabama trailer launch in February, she wore pointed PVC stilettos with vintage Versace. Across each appearance, Kirby has relied on heels with clean lines and exaggerated finishes — think eye-catching metallics, sheer panels and snakeskin — to ground dresses that range from architectural to body-conscious. “The Fantastic Four: First Steps” marks the Marvel franchise's official reboot under Disney, introducing a new cast led by Kirby, Pedro Pascal, Joseph Quinn and Ebon Moss-Bachrach. Directed by Matt Shakman, the film serves as both an origin story and launchpad for the characters' integration into the broader MCU, ahead of their expected crossover appearances in “Avengers: Secret Wars.” The film opens in U.S. theaters on July 25. Read More

transcript: SPR_COMBO[es]El 'Pretty boy” vuelve ser tendencia a pocos días de haber sido visto en Cartagena bailando junto a la modelo Ariadna Gutiérrez en medio de la grabación del videoclip de su más reciente sencillo llamado 'Bronceador'. ","type":"text Ahora Maluma está dando de qué hablar luego de que subiera un particular video a sus redes sociales en el que confesaba que por primera vez había tenido que usar un servicio de Uber para llegar a un compromiso. ","type":"text A pocas horas de subir la historia en su cuenta de Instagram, sus seguidores comentaron la publicación con divertidos mensajes, entre ellos “siempre hay una primera vez para todo”, “muy humilde”, “qué Uber tan bendecido”. ","type":"text ","type":"text Pero el verdadero detalle que muchos usuarios no dejaron pasar fue el objeto con el que viajó el cantante en el carro, al subirse con una lujosa maleta Louis Vuitton, modelo Horizon 50, de la colaboración con el artista Takashi Murakami, valorada en alrededor de 4.500 dólares es decir más de 18 millones de pesos colombianos. ","type":"text La exclusiva maleta hace parte de las colaboraciones artísticas de la marca francesa. Una de las primeras fue en 2002 con el artista japonés Takashi Murakami. ","type":"text Bajo la dirección creativa de Marc Jacobs, Murakami reinterpretó el monograma clásico de la marca usando hasta 33 colores sobre fondo blanco o negro, dando origen a la icónica línea Monogram Multicolore, un éxito comercial que se convirtió en símbolo pop-cultural. ","type":"text Esta fusión entre arte y moda generó piezas memorables como los bolsos Speedy, Keepall, y los imaginativos diseños Cherry Blossom y Monogramouflage, que integraban flores sonrientes y patrones geométricos. ","type":"text La colaboración original se prolongó hasta 2015, y debido a su relevancia y demanda, Louis Vuitton relanzó esta colección en 2025 mediante una reedición en dos fases, revitalizando los clásicos bajo una estética moderna y vibrante. ","type":"text ","type":"text No es sorpresa que Maluma use ese tipo de prendas. En la Met Gala 2021, el cantante paisa sorprendió con un traje de inspiración western firmado por Versace, completamente bordado en cristales y con chaqueta de flecos. ","type":"text ","type":"text También ha lucido creaciones de diseñadores como Balmain, Prada y Valentino. Durante la Met Gala de este año el antioqueño usó un impresionante traje zoot suit bordado en azul medianoche y verde esmeralda, diseñado por Willy Chavarría. ","type":"text El estilismo incluyó un sombrero bolero con rosas, una cadena de reloj y un reloj de lujo valorado en 5 millones de dólares, fabricado por Jacob & Co. con casi 150 quilates de esmeraldas colombianas. ","type":"text ","type":"text ","type"

transcript: Explore the global luxury apparel market to 2029 with insights into key trends, sales, and growth projections across regions. It also highlights key global luxury apparel brands and their current competitive position. The luxury apparel market is expected to have contracted 2.4% in 2024, due to macroeconomic challenges such as inflation in Europe and the US and the downturn in China affecting consumer spending. Between 2024 and 2029, clothing is projected to achieve the strongest category CAGR of 3.1%, driven by ultra-wealthy shoppers prioritizing trend-driven purchases, with womenswear expected to outperform. Asia-Pacific is set to achieve the strongest regional 2024-2029 CAGR of 4.0%, fueled by the recovery of China, along with strong economic growth in emerging markets. Louis Vuitton remains by far the largest luxury apparel brand, slightly gaining share to 9.8% in 2024. Hermes is was the biggest winner in 2024, with its share rising 0.7ppts to 6.0%, thanks to its exclusivity and superior quality retaining ultra-wealthy luxury shoppers. Scope The luxury market will slightly outperform the total apparel market from 2028 onwards as macroeconomic conditions improve The Asia-Pacific region will continue to grow share, thanks to its fast-growing income levels Footwear will continue to underperform out to 2029, as consumers favour trainers from premium and mass market brands Reasons to Buy Gain an understanding of the drivers and inhibitors in the global luxury apparel market Understand where the demand lies within the global luxury apparel market across categories, and brands, to allow you to maximise customer acquisition. La vida de Carla Bruni-Sarkozy (Turín, 1967) es una vida de película. Además de modelo, cantante y actriz, se convirtió en en la esposa del expresidente francés Nicolas Sarkozy en febrero de 2008, tras casarse apenas seis meses después de conocerse. Aquello la posicionó en el foco mediático internacional como pocas veces había ocurrido con una top model. Aquello la posicionó en el foco mediático internacional como pocas veces había ocurrido con una top model. En un abrir y cerrar de ojos, pasó de ser musa de grandes diseñadores a primera dama de Francia e icono de la sofisticación y la elegancia. En un abrir y cerrar de ojos, pasó de ser musa de grandes diseñadores a primera dama de Francia e icono de la sofisticación y la elegancia. Sobre aquella época hablaba en una entrevista concedida en abril de 2025 la edición española de Harper's Bazaar: “El mejor recuerdo de esa etapa fue conocer a mi hombre, porque todo fue maravilloso, fantástico y extremadamente interesante”, puede leerse. Sobre aquella época hablaba en una entrevista concedida en abril de 2025 la edición española de Harper's Bazaar: “El mejor recuerdo de esa etapa fue conocer a mi hombre, porque todo fue maravilloso, fantástico y extremadamente interesante”, puede leerse. Según contó también en dicha entrevista, lo mejor de esos años fue que pudo ayudar a mucha gente: "La gente te pide ayuda cuando estás en una posición así y lo bueno es que puedes hacerlo. No puedes cambiar sus vidas, pero puedes ayudar, y eso fue muy enriquecedor. Te llena el corazón y hace que todo merezca la pena. Toda la parte del poder no es buena para el ser humano”. Según contó también en dicha entrevista, lo mejor de esos años fue que pudo ayudar a mucha gente: "La gente te pide ayuda cuando estás en una posición así y lo bueno es que puedes hacerlo. No puedes cambiar sus vidas, pero puedes ayudar, y eso fue muy enriquecedor. Te llena el corazón y hace que todo merezca la pena. Toda la parte del poder no es buena para el ser humano”. Aunque en distintas entrevistas ha reconocido que se alegra de que ese tiempo pasara, pues era mucha la tensión y la responsabilidad... Aunque en distintas entrevistas ha reconocido que se alegra de que ese tiempo pasara, pues era mucha la tensión y la responsabilidad... Últimamente ha estado más desaparecida del foco público. Quizás tenga que ver con su imputación en el marco de la investigación por la supuesta financiación ilegal de la campaña electoral de 2007 de Nicolas Sarkozy. El propio Nicolas Sarkozy, que también está siendo investigado, ya ha sido condenado en dos ocasiones. Y ella siempre ha estado al lado del que considera el hombre de su vida. El propio Nicolas Sarkozy, que también está siendo investigado, ya ha sido condenado en dos ocasiones. Y ella siempre ha estado al lado del que considera el hombre de su vida. Sobre su historia de amor, que surgió el 13 de noviembre de 2007 en una cena organizada por el empresario de publicidad Jacques Séguéla, pueden saberse los detalles gracias al libro 'Nicolas Sarkozy and Carla Bruni: The True Story'. “Fue inmediato. No esperaba que él fuese tan divertido y vital. Su aspecto, su encanto y su inteligencia me sedujeron”, contó la propia Carla Bruni respecto a aquella primera cita. Carla Bruni conoció a Nicolas Sarkozy durante una cena en noviembre de 2007, gracias a un amigo en común. Aparecieron juntos en público por primera vez en diciembre de 2007, pasando un día en Disneyland París. Todo fue muy rápido entre ellos. Carla Bruni se casó con el Presidente en ejercicio en febrero de 2008, convirtiéndose así en Primera Dama de Francia. La pareja tuvo una hija, Giulia, el 19 de octubre de 2011. Nicolas Sarkozy estaba recién separado de Cécilia Ciganer Albéniz, que se había marchado a Nueva York con Richard Attias, y se enamoró perdidamente de la modelo y cantante. Desde entonces, Carla Bruni y Nicolas Sarkozy parecen sentir un amor apasionado el uno por el otro. Aunque la cantante ha sido durante mucho tiempo una devoradora de hombres -y ella no lo oculta-, parece que su pasado sulfuroso ya quedó verdaderamente atrás. Junto al expresidente francés tuvo a su hija Giulia, que vino al mundo el 19 de octubre de 2011 en la clínica de La Muette. Y actualmente, Carla Bruni también está volcada en la educación de una hija en plena adolescencia. Y actualmente, Carla Bruni también está volcada en la educación de una hija en plena adolescencia. Además de Giulia, Carla Bruni es madre de Aurélien Enthoven, al que tuvo en el año 2001 con el filósofo y escritor Raphaël Enthoven. El hijo mayor de Carla Bruni, además de licenciado en Ciencias Políticas por la Universidad de Columbia, ha seguido los pasos de su famosa madre sobre la pasarela y ya ha desfilado para firmas como Versace. transcript: The Vera Wang Princess Eau de Toilette is Amazon's number one best-seller in the perfume category and has an over 54,000 ratings Bookmark Share Tiffany LoFashion and Beauty Journalist Nina Crighton Bookmark Amazon shoppers can snap up discounted perfumes (Image: YakobchukOlena via ) We are in the final hours of Amazon's Prime Day Sale and shoppers looking for a new perfume are urged to snap up this Vera Wang Princess Eau de Toilette with 72% off. Featured as Amazon's Choice and a top seller in the perfume category, the fruity floral fragrance is dropped from £42 to £11.72 for Prime members. Non-members can sign up here for a 30-day trial and enjoy the discount before the sale event ends tonight (July 11) at 11:59pm. The Vera Wang Princess Eau de Toilette reigns top on the online retail platform with an impressive 54,567 global ratings. The scent features a divine mix with top notes of apple and water lily, a heart of pink guava and dark chocolate, and a rich base of amber and vanilla. READ MORE: Get £330 of luxury beauty products for £40 with this special discount code READ MORE: Amazon slashes price of Oral-B iO3 toothbrush by over 50% as shoppers rave about 'dentist clean' results The feminine heart-shaped bottle crowned with a regal golden cap and amethyst-coloured crystals makes it a perfect gift for yourself or someone special. The bottle cap contains a hidden treasure - a keepsake gold band that can be worn as a ring. Vera Wang Princess Eau de Toilette 30ml A spirit fragrance for women, inspired by a princess. Confident, independent, wish a total zest for life. The Vera Wang princess scent is an exotic fruity, floral bouquet teased with vanilla and an unexpected twist of pink guava £11.72 Amazon If you're looking for a bigger bottle, Boots is also offering the same fragrance in a 100ml bottle for £26, available for next-day delivery with the code FREENEXTDAY. In another fabulous find, Charlotte Tilbury is presenting its "mood-boosting" Love Frequency Perfume Set at a steal for £91, down from £130 – that's a saving of 30%. This deal includes the brand's woody floral scent in both 100ml and 10ml bottles, reports the Express. The delicate and floral fragrance has been hailed as "perfect for daytime" whilst devoted admirers have dubbed it their "all time favourite". One buyer observed: "What sets Vera Wang Princess apart is its versatility. It seamlessly transitions from day to night, making it suitable for various occasions. Whether you're attending a casual outing or a formal event, this fragrance complements any ensemble and leaves a trail of elegance and charm in your wake." The popular perfume is now rduced to £12 in final hours of Amazon sale A thrilled purchaser revealed their experience: "My wife loves this. It smells beautiful, not too strong but the smell lingers for hours/days. A very sweet floral smell, I guarantee everyone will compliment." Another customer penned: "Bought this multiple times as my partner can't get enough of it over more expensive perfumes I've bought her. The bottle size is also great." A third buyer conveyed their instant affection for the scent, declaring: "First time trying this perfume and I love it that much that I bought another one, got big size bottles and well worth it. It's my new favourite scent." However, not every review was sparkling; one shopper complained about the perfume's staying power: "Beautiful scent but doesn't last at all, I have to add more on several times during the day. Smells lovely and fresh though." Bridal fashion designer Vera Wang launched her Princess perfume in 2006 and it's been a hit since (Image: Dave Benett, Max Cisotti/Dave Benett/) Another customer felt disappointed by the fragrance's lack of strength: "Its a nice perfume but the smell is a bit faint, it's a bit too subtle and doesn't last very long. Really need to sniff to figure out the notes." However, a delighted buyer gushed: "It's versatile for any occasion and leaves a lasting impression. A true masterpiece." Those keen to buy can find Vera Wang's Princess Eau De Toilette currently discounted on Amazon. Meanwhile, LookFantastic is offering 50% off Versace's Woman Eau de Parfum 50ml, now £33 down from £66. Furthermore, Boots has unveiled a major fragrance sale, with selected perfumes slashed to half price.

transcript: It's a brand the Princess of Wales had enjoyed earlier in her royal life. Rachel Burchfield is the contributing royals editor at InStyle, where she covers news about the British royal family on a daily basis, including the work and wardrobes of Kate Middleton and Meghan Markle. Close Princess Diana on June 17, 1997. Credit: Getty Though Princess Diana wore Chanel tweed suits earlier in her royal life, in her later years—and especially after her 1996 divorce—she found it difficult to wear Chanel for the most heartbreaking reason. The brand's interlocked Cs iconic logo reminded her too much of Prince Charles and Camilla Parker Bowles—whose affair dominated much of Diana's 15-year marriage to Charles. As Diana herself said in a 1995 interview, there were three people in her marriage, so it was a bit crowded. In the final years of her life, Princess Diana was a fan of many designer labels—think Versace and Dior, for starters—but one fashion house she avoided? Chanel—and for the most heartbreaking reason. It's not because she wasn't a fan of their clothes—it boiled down to her husband Prince Charles's longstanding affair with Camilla Parker Bowles, an affair that had plagued much of their marriage. Chanel, of course, is known for its interlocking Cs—and this reminded the Princess of Wales too much of Charles and Camilla. Because of Chanel's iconic logo, Diana “could no longer bring herself” to wear the brand, People reported. Princess Diana wearing Chanel earlier in her royal life. Getty After marrying in 1981, Charles and Diana separated in 1992 and finalized their divorce in 1996—just one year before her untimely death. Though she had worn Chanel tweed suits early in her royal life, after her divorce, Diana couldn't wear Chanel because, as Australian designer Jayson Brundson told Harper's Bazaar, “She said, 'No, I can't wear linked Cs, the double C.” Brundson styled Diana for a hospital charity event during what would ultimately become her last visit Down Under in 1996. After choosing a pair of Chanel shoes to compliment her cream Versace skirt suit, Diana demurred at wearing them. “I asked why, and she said, 'It's Camilla and Charles,'” Brundson recalled. Princess Diana in Sydney, Australia on November 1, 1996. Getty Princess Diana in Versace on October 31, 1996 in Sydney, Australia. Getty “It was definitely the timing, it being post-divorce,” he continued. “She would have seen linked Cs, and they would have just reminded her of Charles and Camilla. The shoes were quite boldly Chanel—I think they had gold linked Cs on them. And I think for photo optics, people would have honed in on that considering it was so fresh after the divorce, as well.” Adding insult to injury, during her marriage to Charles, Diana found a pair of cufflinks Charles owned engraved with interlocked Cs—which she interpreted as an homage to Charles and Camilla. “It's hard to believe that anyone as intelligent and well-read as the Prince of Wales could be so stupid—so utterly incapable of imagining what a new wife might conclude if her husband carried a photograph of his old girlfriend in his diary,” royal biographer Penny Junor wrote in her biography of Camilla called The Duchess: The Untold Story. Princess Diana in Chanel earlier in her royal life. Getty Speaking to Andrew Morton for his bombshell 1992 biography about her called Diana: Her True Story, Diana recalled Charles sending Camilla flowers with a signed card reading “To Gladys from Fred”—their nicknames for one another. “[I met her] very early on,” Diana said of Camilla (via People). “I was introduced to the circle, but obviously I was a threat. I was a very young girl, but I was a threat. We always had discussions about Camilla, though. I once heard him on the telephone in his bath on his handheld set saying, 'Whatever happens, I will always love you.' I told him afterwards that I had listened at the door, and we had a filthy row.” About two weeks before their wedding on July 29, 1981, someone in Charles's office told Diana that he had a bracelet made for Camilla with “G” and “F” (for Gladys and Fred) intertwined on it. “I was devastated,” Diana said. Prince Charles and Lady Diana Spencer after their wedding ceremony at St. Paul's Cathedral on July 29, 1981. / Fox Photos / Hulton Archive “So I had lunch with my sisters and said, 'I can't marry him, I can't do this, this is absolutely unbelievable,'” Diana recalled. “They were wonderful and said, 'Well, bad luck Duch [Diana's childhood nickname], your face is on the tea towels, so you're too late to chicken out.' So we made light of it.” Diana added that, on their honeymoon, she noticed cufflinks on her husband's wrists—“Two Cs entwined like the Chanel Cs,” she said. “Got it in one; knew exactly. ' Camilla gave you those, didn't she?'...

transcript: SPR_COMBO[vi]Theo PageSix, Jeff Bezos và Lauren Sánchez vừa có màn tái xuất ấn tượng tại hội nghị kín ở Sun Valley, Idaho (Mỹ) – nơi được mệnh danh là “trại hè tỷ phú.” Cặp đôi không rời nhau nửa bước, xuất hiện nổi bật giữa dàn khách mời quyền lực. Lauren Sánchez khoe vẻ ngoài rạng rỡ với bảng tên ghi họ mới – Lauren Sánchez Bezos. Cô diện áo tank top đen, quần trắng, kính râm cổ điển, hoa tai kim cương, thắt lưng đen bản nhỏ và chiếc túi Hermès Kelly da cá sấu hiếm có. Trong khi đó, tỷ phú Amazon Jeff Bezos chọn phong cách đơn giản với áo thun xám, quần jeans và kính râm phi công. Cả hai không ngần ngại thể hiện tình cảm trước công chúng, thu hút mọi ống kính khi vừa xuất hiện. Sự kiện Sun Valley do Allen & Company tổ chức từ năm 1983, mỗi năm quy tụ các ông lớn ngành công nghệ, truyền thông, tài chính. Danh sách khách mời năm nay có những cái tên đình đám như Mark Zuckerberg, Tim Cook, Gayle King, Ivanka Trump, Wendi Murdoch. Các chủ đề thảo luận tập trung vào tác động mạnh mẽ của trí tuệ nhân tạo (AI) đối với các ngành công nghiệp toàn cầu. Trước đó, Lauren Sánchez cũng gây chú ý khi dự tiệc cùng bạn thân Brooks Nader tại Paris, diện váy đỏ ôm sát gợi cảm của Versace. Hai tuần trước, Jeff Bezos và Lauren Sánchez vừa tổ chức lễ cưới hoành tráng tại Venice, Ý, trên đảo San Giorgio Maggiore. Sự kiện quy tụ loạt sao hạng A như Leonardo DiCaprio, Oprah Winfrey, Orlando Bloom, Kim Kardashian. Ông Luca Zaia, Chủ tịch vùng Veneto, ước tính tổng chi phí lễ cưới và các hoạt động bên lề lên tới 40-48 triệu euro (khoảng 47-56 triệu USD). Tuy được gọi là “đám cưới thế kỷ,” sự kiện cũng gây tranh cãi. Nhiều người dân Venice hoan nghênh, coi đây là dịp quảng bá du lịch, nhưng không ít ý kiến lo ngại thành phố dần biến thành “sân chơi của giới siêu giàu.”

Các chủ đề thảo luận tập trung vào tác động mạnh mẽ của trí tuệ nhân tạo (AI) đối với các ngành công nghiệp toàn cầu. Trước đó, Lauren Sánchez cũng gây chú ý khi dự tiệc cùng bạn thân Brooks Nader tại Paris, diện váy đỏ ôm sát gợi cảm của Versace. Hai tuần trước, Jeff Bezos và Lauren Sánchez vừa tổ chức lễ cưới hoành tráng tại Venice, Ý, trên đảo San Giorgio Maggiore. Sự kiện quy tụ loạt sao hạng A như Leonardo DiCaprio, Oprah Winfrey, Orlando Bloom, Kim Kardashian. Ông Luca Zaia, Chủ tịch vùng Veneto, ước tính tổng chi phí lễ cưới và các hoạt động bên lề lên tới 40-48 triệu euro (khoảng 47-56 triệu USD). Tuy được gọi là “đám cưới thế kỷ,” sự kiện cũng gây tranh cãi. Nhiều người dân Venice hoan nghênh, coi đây là dịp quảng bá du lịch, nhưng không ít ý kiến lo ngại thành phố dần biến thành “sân chơi của giới siêu giàu.”
reasoning: The comment mentions Versace in the context of Lauren Sánchez wearing a red, form-fitting Versace dress at a party in Paris. While the content is primarily about Jeff Bezos and Lauren Sánchez, the specific reference to a Versace dress makes it relevant to the brand, particularly in the fashion/style context.

transcript: SPR_COMBO[sq]Vëllë, kjo s'është thjesht modë  është *manifest psikologjik* me ngjyrime trap. **Duam të dukemi sikur jemi “dikushi”**. Nuk na mban më xhepi, na mban logoja. Balenciaga për ne është si diplomë në Harvard. Njerëzit duan të ndihen të rëndësishëm, edhe nëse s'e dinë saktësisht pse. **Estetikë e dominancës**. Kur s'ke ndonjë pozicion të madh në shoqëri, të paktën ngjaj si shef. Sytë e fshehur pas syzeve, mimika zero dhe ecja si të ketë rënë bomba janë mënyra për të thënë: *mos më afro se kam kredi për të paguar*. **Instagrami është psikologu i kombit**. Në vend të ndjekim ëndrrat, ndjekim story-t e atyre që bëjnë “life coaching” me Gucci. Rrobat e markës janë like-at në botën reale. **Inferioritet i paketuar si superioritet**. Në thelb, shumë ndihen jo mjaftueshëm. Po si thuhet kjo shqip? Me Versace me shkëlqim dhe me një borsete që duket sikur fsheh një plan biznesi (por është bosh). **Edukimi estetik: mision i pamundur**. Askush s'na mëson që shija nuk blihet. Po s'ka faj njeri  nëse s'e bën dot artin, bën artificin. Në fund të ditës, vëllë, ndoshta s'është faj i askujt. Duket bukur në TikTok, ndjehesh më “boss” dhe borseta s'të zë shumë vend.

transcript: SPR_COMBO[es]La actriz interpreta a quien fue la esposa del expresidente y en su personaje refleja la moda de la época. Menem, la serie relata la vida personal de Carlos Saúl Menem como también su paso por la presidencia y su controvertido gobierno, que es recordado hasta el día de hoy. Un personaje clave en la ficción es el que interpreta Griselda Siciliani. La actriz se pone en la piel de Zulema Yoma, quien fue esposa del líder político y es madre de Zulemita y Carlos Menem Jr. Además de su interpretación, la artista muestra los atuendos típicos de la época. Precisamente, 4 looks fueron los que más llamaron la atención de los espectadores. Cuáles son los looks clásicos de los '90 que lleva Griselda Siciliani en Menem, la serie Griselda Siciliani es la encargada de personificar a Zulema Yoma en la nueva serie biográfica de Carlos Sául Menem, que ya se encuentra disponible en Prime Video. Por esta razón, la artista pertenece al reparto principal de la historia junto a Leonardo Sbaraglia, quien hace del expresidente. A lo largo de los seis capítulos, la actriz luce diferentes vestuarios que solía usar Zulema en aquel entonces. Desde piezas sofisticadas a looks más casuales para el día a día. De hecho, uno de ellos está compuesto por una camisa de una reconocida firma, que en los años '90 causaba furor. Se trata de una prenda de seda, diseñada por Gianni Versace, de estilo sofisticado y maximalismo bastante común en aquella época. Además, su corte holgado y fluido refuerza la estética retro y glam que se buscó para recrear esta escena. Otro look que llamó la atención es el tapado de piel que luce Griselda Siciliani en una de las tomas junto a su compañero Leonardo Sbaraglia como Menem. Este abrigo de piel sintética y diseño animal print fue otro ítem típico de la moda noventosa. Su uso reflejaba lujo, poder, estatus y sofisticación en aquellos tiempos y Zulema Yoma lo sabía. Esta pieza encajaba a la perfección con el espíritu de la época: exagerado, llamativo y aspiracional. No solo lo usaban integrantes del entorno familiar del riojano, sino también figuras destacadas del espectáculo argentino. En otra de las escenas, Griselda Sicliani lleva otro look muy representativo de los '90. Se trata de un conjunto deportivo y urbano en color celeste. La campera de corte amplio y estilo vintage con cierre hasta el cuello demuestra que en aquellos tiempos la ropa para hacer deportes formaba parte de la vida cotidiana de la sociedad. Por último, este personaje también lleva un traje elegante que supo ser tendencia. El mismo está compuesto por una chaqueta con botones y una falda de raso texturado con acabado tornasolado en tonalidad celeste. Al mismo lo combinó con una camisa blanca por debajo y unos accesorios dorados. De esta manera, Griselda Siciliani no sólo muestra cómo era la relación de Zulema Yoma con Carlos Saúl Menem, sino que también refleja el estilismo propio de la época y destaca las tendencias que se llevaban en 4 looks en particular. SFA - RevistaCaras

transcript: Vanessa Kirby joined co-star Julia Garner for The Fantastic Four: First Steps London photocall at the Corinthia Hotel this afternoon, giving us another maternity look to file under “cool and considered”. Tim P. Whitby/ for The Walt Disney Company Limited After serving up a series of unexpected silhouettes and colour stories that veered away from her signature minimalist leanings, Vanessa has been a joy to watch on this tour. Every look has felt deliberate, styled to tell a story, and worthy of its moment. So maybe that's why this navy Magda Butrym hooded midi dress felt a little muted in comparison. Adir Abergel There's definitely a vibe. The hood pulled up, paired with her Port Tanger Malick sunglasses, gave it a moody, cinematic edge. Almost The Matrix by way of a fashion editorial. She looked great, no question—but after the visual impact of her Altuzarra, Loewe, Balmain, and Atelier Versace moments, this one felt more understated than expected. Still, it's Vanessa, so the bar is already sky-high. Stylist: Andrew Mukamal. Hair Stylist: Adir Abergel. Makeup Artist: Jo Baker. transcript: SPR_COMBO[es]Belinda protagonizó un momento inolvidable al interpretar “Él me mintió” acompañada nada menos que por Amanda Miguel al piano, durante una proyección especial de Mentiras, la serie en Los Ángeles. El emotivo dueto ocurrió mientras Belinda y el productor Luis Gerardo Méndez recibían una placa de platino por parte de Warner Music, que certifica 100 millones de reproducciones de la banda sonora de la exitosa producción de Prime Video. Beli me da mucha ternura. Es una mujer pero a la vez sigue siendo como esa pequeña de 10 años que veíamos en las telenovelas  pic.twitter.com/WyqFcbjjyr — лорена ️‍ (@M1k1Chan) July 11, 2025 Desde su estreno el pasado 13 de junio, Mentiras, la serie, inspirada en el icónico musical ochentero, se convirtió en un fenómeno en Latinoamérica y Estados Unidos, logrando posicionarse en el Top 5 en 14 países y alcanzando el noveno lugar entre los contenidos más vistos en la historia de la plataforma en México. Gran parte de este éxito se debe a la participación de Belinda, quien da vida a Daniela Levy de Mijares, un personaje lleno de matices que ha conquistado al público tanto por su actuación como por su talento vocal. La artista no solo impresionó con su interpretación de clásicos del pop mexicano, sino que cuidó cada detalle de su personaje, seleccionando personalmente un vestuario de firmas como Versace, Chanel y Hermès, que realzó la elegancia de cada escena. El momento más emotivo de la noche fue cuando, tras interpretar el icónico tema frente a su autora original, Amanda Miguel, la legendaria cantante no pudo contener las lágrimas y le dedicó palabras de admiración. “Cantas precioso, lo hiciste muy bien y apenas estás mostrando lo que verdaderamente puedes hacer”. Belinda, visiblemente emocionada, respondió: “Te amamos, te admiramos y eres la mejor”. La banda sonora de Mentiras ha reavivado el gusto por las baladas románticas de los 80. Solo “Él me mintió” sumó más de 1.8 millones de reproducciones en Spotify en una semana, con un aumento del 94% desde el estreno. Tras la proyección, ambas artistas celebraron este logro con una interpretación íntima que rápidamente se volvió viral, sellando uno de los momentos más memorables para los fans de la nostalgia pop y confirmando a Belinda como una de las figuras más queridas y versátiles del entretenimiento actual.

transcript: The custom look put a spin on the brand's signature underwear set Starr Bowenbank Link copied Parkwood Entertainment;Courtesy of Calvin Klein Beyoncé in Calvin Klein NEED TO KNOW Beyoncé wore a custom Calvin Klein look for her Cowboy Carter Tour stop in Maryland The singer's look consisted of the brand's signature logo bralette and high-waisted panty but was embroidered with thousands of crystal beads The entire outfit took nearly 250 hours to make Beyoncé is no stranger to a custom stage look, but one of the pop star's latest tour outfits put a very glamorous spin on an iconic underwear set. The "Texas Hold 'Em" singer, 43, took her Cowboy Carter Tour to the Northwest Stadium in Landover, Md., on July 7 and unveiled a brand new look, courtesy of Calvin Klein. While performing "Bodyguard," the 35-time Grammy Award winner wore a sparkling black and gold underwear set designed by creative director Veronica Leoni, a milestone that marks the designer's first custom look for Calvin Klein Collection. Parkwood Entertainment Beyoncé in Calvin Klein The set featured the iconic logo bralette and high-waisted panty the the brand is known for, but contained more than a few dazzling embellishments to make it stage appropriate — the set was bedazzled with black and gold beads, which formed a subtle striped pattern and glittered with every camera flash and stage spotlight. The brand's signature Calvin Klein logo waistband was present on both the bralette and the high-waisted panty. Courtesy of Calvin Klein Beyoncé in Calvin Klein Beyoncé teamed the look with a denim winged cape that contained feather detailing, also in black and gold. The brand confirmed in a press release that the item was "embroidered with over 28 thousand crystal beads and sequins" and "took 246 hours to complete - a testament to the meticulous craftsmanship and modern elegance Calvin Klein is known for." Parkwood Entertainment Beyoncé in Calvin Klein The pop star completed the glittering gold and black look with a pair of matching thigh-high boots. Beyoncé's Cowboy Carter Tour has featured several custom looks with laborious elements. Earlier in the tour, the singer enlisted Donatella Versace to create two custom looks — a hand-cut and hand-sewn white fringe and a crystal-covered bodysuit and a quilted ball gown covered in Versace's barocco print — for her June 6 and June 7 shows in Tottenham Hotspur Stadium in London. The outfits took a total of 1,100 hours to create. Courtesy of Calvin Klein Beyoncé in Calvin Klein "When you design something for the catwalk, it is one thing, but then when you see Beyoncé bring a look to life and make it move so incredible on the stage, that gives me the greatest pleasure. She is a goddess, one of the nicest people on the planet and a true superstar. I can see the clothes giving her confidence and I can see how she uses them to enhance the performance," Donatella told PEOPLE exclusively following the shows. transcript: SPR_COMBO[tr]Türk Silahlı Kuvvetleri (TSK) içinde gizlice örgütlenmiş Fethullahçı Terör Örgütü (FETÖ) mensupları, seçilmiş Cumhurbaşkanı'nı ortadan kaldırmak, hükümeti devirmek, parlamentoyu, anayasayı ve demokrasiyi ilga etmek amacıyla 15 Temmuz 2016'da kanlı darbe girişiminde bulundu. 13.07.2025 11:48:00 Anadolu Ajansı Genelkurmay Başkanlığı Karargahı'nda, TSK içerisindeki FETÖ mensubu bir grup subay tarafından başlatılan darbe girişimi, tüm yurtta yaklaşık 21 saatte kontrol altına alındı. 15 Temmuz günü başlayan darbe teşebbüsüne ilişkin faaliyetler, 16 Temmuz Cumartesi saat 13.00'te bertaraf edildi. Cumhurbaşkanı Recep Tayyip Erdoğan'ın bir televizyon kanalının canlı yayınına bağlanarak halkı meydanlara davet etmesinin ardından, başta İstanbul ve Ankara olmak üzere Türkiye'nin 81 ilinde çok sayıda vatandaş darbe girişimini engellemek, milli iradeye sahip çıkmak için sokaklara döküldü. Bu süreçte, FETÖ'cü askerlerin jetlerden attığı bombalar, helikopter ve tanklardan açtığı ateş sonucu 253 kişi şehit, 2 bin 740 kişi gazi oldu. FETÖ'cü askerlerce yapılan saldırılarda, TBMM, Cumhurbaşkanlığı Külliyesi'nin çevresi, Gölbaşı Özel Harekat Daire Başkanlığı, TÜRKSAT ve Ankara Emniyet Müdürlüğü ağır hasar gördü. Belli başlı öteki olaylar 14 Temmuz 1683 - Osmanlı orduları, Viyana'yı ikinci kez kuşattı. 1789 - Silahlanan Paris halkının, krallık baskısının simgesi olarak gördükleri Bastille Hapishanesi'ni ele geçirmesiyle Fransız Devrimi başladı. 1926 - Mustafa Kemal Paşa'ya yönelik İzmir suikastı girişimi gerekçesiyle Ziya Hurşit ve arkadaşları idam edildi. 1936 - Türkiye, olimpiyatlarda ilk altın madalyayı aldı. Yaşar Erkan, Berlin Olimpiyatları'nda güreşte 61 kiloda birinci oldu. 1942 - Atılay denizaltısı battı, 39 subay ve er şehit oldu. 1948 - Yerli Film Yapanlar Cemiyetince düzenlenen ilk film festivalinde, Şakir Sırmalı'nın yönettiği "Unutulan Sır" birinciliğe değer bulundu. 1958 - Irak'ta General Abdülkerim Kasım yönetimindeki ihtilalci ordu birlikleri, kanlı darbeyle yönetimi ele geçirdi. Kral Faysal, Kral Naibi Prens Abdulilah ile Başbakan Nuri Said öldürüldü. 1960 - Eski Konya Valisi Cemil Keleşoğlu, Yassıada'da intihar etti. 1966 - Meclis, Yassıada mahkumları ile siyasi firarileri affetti. 1968 - İsmail Dümbüllü, İstanbul Açıkhava Tiyatrosu'nda düzenlenen gecede sahneye veda etti. 1971 - Kültür Bakanlığı kuruldu. İlk bakan Talat Sait Halman oldu. 1971 - Atatürk'ün yakın arkadaşı Kılıç Ali vefat etti. 1982 - Devlet Bakanı ve Başbakan Yardımcısı Turgut Özal, Maliye Bakanı Kaya Erdem ile İmar ve İskan Bakanı Şerif Tüten, görevlerinden istifa etti. 1983 - Brüksel Büyükelçiliği İdari Ataşesi Dursun Aksoy, ASALA tarafından katledildi. 1987 - Doğu ve Güneydoğu Anadolu'da sekiz ili bünyesinde toplayan Olağanüstü Hal Bölge Valiliği kuruldu. OHAL Valiliğine Diyarbakır Valisi Hayri Kozakçıoğlu atandı. 1995 - Yazar Bilge Karasu, 65 yaşında öldü. 1997 - İstanbul Harbiye Orduevi'ne lav silahıyla ateş açıldı. 1997 - Anadolu Ajansı muhabiri Murat Koç, trafik kazasında vefat etti. 2001 - Türk basınının ilk kadın foto muhabiri Eleni Küreman, İstanbul'da vefat etti. 2004 - Organize suç örgütü elebaşı Alaattin Çakıcı, Avusturya'nın Graz kentinde eski MİT mensubu Faik Meral adına düzenlenmiş pasaportla yakalandı. 2004 - Tiyatro sanatçısı İsmail Hakkı Sunat (38), gürültü yüzünden tartıştığı komşusu tarafından tabancayla öldürüldü. 2005 - Van Cumhuriyet Başsavcılığının kararıyla Yüzüncü Yıl Üniversitesi Rektörü Prof. Dr. Yücel Aşkın'ın evinde emniyet müdürlüğü ekiplerince arama yapıldı. 2008 - "Ergenekon" soruşturması kapsamında tutuklu bulunan ATO Başkanı Sinan Aygün tahliye edildi. 2011 - Futbolda şike soruşturmasında gözaltına alınan Beşiktaş Jimnastik Kulübü Asbaşkanı Serdal Adalı ile Futbol Takımı Teknik Direktörü Tayfur Havutçu'nun da aralarında bulunduğu 5 kişi tutuklandı. 2015 - Amerikan Havacılık ve Uzay Dairesi (NASA), "New Horizons (Yeni Ufuklar)" uzay aracının, "gizemli gezegen" olarak bilinen Plüton'a en yakın uçuşu sırasında çektiği fotoğraflarda, gezegende jeolojik hareketlilik olduğu ve gezegenin bazı bölgelerinde hareket eden buz kütleleri bulunduğu anlaşıldı. 2016 - Fransa'nın güneyindeki Nice kentinde bir teröristin, 14 Temmuz Ulusal Gün kutlaması yapan kalabalığın arasına kamyonla girmesi sonucu 84 kişi öldü, 200'e yakın kişi yaralandı. Ülkede üç günlük yas ilan edildi. 2016 - Erzincan'daki "Ergenekon" davasının gizli tanıklarına hapis cezası verilen kararın gerekçesinde, "FETÖ/PDY'nin silahlı terör örgütü olduğunun kabul edilmesi gerektiği"ne yer verildi. Böylece FETÖ/PDY'nin silahlı terör örgütü olduğu ilk kez bir mahkeme kararına girdi. 2016 - Ankara Cumhuriyet Başsavcılığının, FETÖ/PDY ile ilgili örgütün elebaşı Fetullah Gülen'in de arasında bulunduğu 73 şüpheli hakkında hazırladığı "çatı iddianamesi", Ankara 4. Ağır Ceza Mahkemesine gönderildi. 2017 - OHAL kapsamında yayımlanan 692 sayılı KHK ile toplam 7 bin 395 kişi kamu görevinden çıkarıldı, 263 kişi görevine iade edildi. 342 emekli TSK personelinin de rütbeleri alındı. 2017 - İsrail polisi, Mescid-i Aksa'da silahlı saldırı girişiminde bulunduğunu iddia ettiği 3 Filistinliyi öldürdü, Mescid-i Aksa'yı kapattı. Mescid-i Aksa'da 1969'dan bu yana ilk kez cuma namazı kılınmadı. 2018 - Tarihin başlangıç noktası olarak nitelendirilen Göbeklitepe'de, 15 anıtsal tapınak ile 200'den fazla dikili taşın daha olduğu tespit edildi....
